input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: My decision has a direct effect on penguin mood and penguin survival. Penguin mood has a direct effect on penguin survival. Method 1: We look directly at how my decision correlates with penguin survival in general. Method 2: We look at this correlation case by case according to penguin mood. To understand how my decision affects penguin survival, is it more correct to use the Method 1 than Method 2?
